name: Pinball Clown
description:
Pinball Wizard
Pinball Clown

-----------------------------

Multiballs, Multipliers and Teleports

Lights, Noise and Points

-----------------------------

Are you a Pinball Clown
Or a Pinball Wizard?

-----------------------------

Fire Ball: F or Right Shift

Left Bumpers: A or Left Ctrl

Right Bumpers: L or Right Ctrl

Nudge: N

-----------------------------
Can you get onto the High Score Table?
-----------------------------

Mini prototype game created for the Pinball Quest as part of GameDev.Tv "Unity Challenge Club" (as of April 10th in early access )
